title: Newest LOL patch has Malware
body:
My anti virus software kept popping up saying the newest patch has malware.

I have reinstalled and tried again however it still insists Leagues has malware

Please check this

replies.body:
Yes, it happend to mi too. 
(D:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_launcher\releases\0.0.1.10\deploy\jpatch.exe) And my antivirus says:	HEUR/QVM10.1.Malware.Gen.

I reinstalled the game, but it still detect it, it means that its not a virus from my computer, but the files from the lol installer itself.
Dont know if its false alarm, or riot got hacked.
btw, my antivirus program is 360 security.
Just in case you don't check back on this thread, you should look at the Riot response.

Hello YBang,

We received some reports that Qihoo 360 Total Security is reporting a false positive with the latest League of Legends patch. I haven't heard or used this application before, but it seems that you won't be able to launch the game client properly until you've added the League of Legends folder to the Trust List. 

I was able to trace that antivirus application to their website, please check the 360 Total Security Support & FAQ page under "How do I feedback a false positive." They have steps on how to add League of Legends onto the application's Trust List:

https://www.360totalsecurity.com/en/help/

Additionally, you may also submit a false positive report to their website through this address so they know to look further into this detection incident:

https://www.360totalsecurity.com/en/suspicion/

Try doing a repair afterwards or--if you're still unable to launch the League of Legends client--try forcing a repatch with the steps outlined here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq5

If you're still having trouble launching League of Legends after all of those steps, please submit a support ticket here so we can look into it further:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new
What program are you using? I'm going to assume its just a false positive
